description: ABPM is a dataset with 33 features and 6 labels. The dataset has 270 records of blood pressure measurements from patients in a duration of 24 hours. The features represent general information for the patients as gender, age, weight, height, but also various statistical features obtained from the diastolic and systolic load values. The labels represent the presence and absence of validity, morning surge, blood pressure load, blood pressure variability, pulse pressure and circadian rhythm.
name: ABPM
